front.title: A Review of Published Criteria for Acceptance Into a Complaint Feedback Loop Program

abstract.t: All known Feedback Generators (the operators of complaint feedbackloops) have some criteria for acceptance of requests to receivefeedback. This document is a review of such criteria, where publiclyavailable. It is intended to inform design decisions within the MailAbuse Reporting Format (MARF) Working Group [MARF-WG], and likelywill never advance beyond internet-draft status.The information included herein was gathered from public web sites.
